prompts: Generate a Pokemon inspired by icy landscapes with a unique electric twist.
Create a creature that combines the traits of a dinosaur and a penguin, with bright colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with a snow-covered body and lightning-themed features.
Design a whimsical creature that thrives in cold climates and has an electric personality.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a mix between a sea creature and a snowy mountain dweller.
Show me a mythical Pokemon that can control ice and electricity, looking both playful and powerful.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that is both cute and fierce, with distinctive icy spikes.

distinctive_features: Snowy body with an icy texture
